title: Client
body: My new client has a problem in which i am not able to purchase any champions with IP or RP though It says i have enough but i haven't bought anything.

replies.body:
We saw this crop up after the Store outage last week. I'd recommend working around this by launching into the *Legacy Client* to make the purchase. You can access this at the login screen anytime:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if you have any questions.
Yeah I tried to launch the legacy client and any time that I try to launch it, it would instantly crash
Did you receive a bugsplat or any sort of crash error before it completely closed down the processes?
